title: Remarks by President Biden During Quad Fellowship Announcement Photo Spray | The White House
content: KanteiTokyo, Japan12:46 P.M. JSTQ    Mr. President, is the policy of strategic ambiguity towards Taiwan dead?PRESIDENT BIDEN:  No.Q    Could you explain? PRESIDENT BIDEN:  No. Q    Mr. President, do — would you send troops to Taiwan if China invaded?PRESIDENT BIDEN:  The policy has not changed at all.  I stated that when I made my statement yesterday.12:47 P.M. JST
